title: Torn clue scroll

properties.name: description
properties.value: Torn clue scrolls are parts of the next clue scroll step during a master clue. Solving each part of a three-part master cryptic clue gives a torn clue scroll, which can be combined to continue the treasure trail.

Torn clue scrolls are parts of the next clue scroll step during a master clue. Solving each part of a three-part master cryptic clue gives a torn clue scroll, which can be combined to continue the treasure trail.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
18 April 2019
(update)

Part 3 was given a graphical update, while part 2 was given a second graphical update.

11 April 2019
(update | poll)

Parts 1 and 2 were given a graphical update.

9 November 2017
(update)

The torn clue scrolls had their Drop option changed to a Destroy option.

17 August 2017
(update)
  • A left-click "Combine" option was added.
  • The "Inspect" option was made right-click.
9 March 2017
(update)

The items' values were increased from 1 to 20.
